fields.title: Content Type
fields.name: type
fields.description: Required to tell Front Matter that this is a schematize page. Setting this to anything other than 'toroidal/admin' prevents Front Matter from recognizing this content type properly.

fields.title: Output Formats
fields.name: outputs
fields.description: Specifies the content type that makes this an administration page. If this value isn’t set, the Toroidal module won’t process the page correctly. A webring without an administration page won’t work properly.

fields.title: Administration Details
fields.name: AdminDetails
fields.description: This setting defines the partial to use for the 'About Member Administration' details element in a webring's administration page. For more information, see: https://platen.io/schemas/toroidal/content/admin/#admindetails
